snippet: The retail leasing business is increasingly handled by specialty brokerage firms that use data to advise multinational retail chains and institutional landlords.
abstract: Retail leasing business is increasingly handled by specialty brokerage firms that use data to advise multinational retail chains and institutional landlords, a shift in commercial real estate in the last decade away from a tight-knit group of brokers, tenants and local landlords; in New York City, where the stakes are higher than anywhere else in the country due to the proliferation of national and global chains and skyrocketing rents, little is left to chance.
lead_paragraph: The retail leasing business is increasingly handled by specialty brokerage firms that use data to advise multinational retail chains and institutional landlords.

headline.seo: Data Trumps Gut Instinct in Retail Brokering
headline.main: Homework Trumps Gut Instinct in Retail Brokering
headline.print_headline: Homework Trumps Gut Instinct in Retail Brokering
